attributes.action: Offer Group B streptococcus (GBS) test to all pregnant women
attributes.additional_details:
My daughter was born with this and luckily was treated within 6 hours, however some are not as lucky as their babies sadly pass away from it. 
It needs to be routinely tested in the UK, just like it is around the world.
attributes.background: Make testing available at routine midwife checks

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608081
